titles.title: Capital Expenditure Expansion Act of 1995
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to disregard up to $15,000,000 of capital expenditures in applying the provisions permitting a $10,000,000 limit on qualified small issue bonds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/21/1995--Introduced. Capital Expenditure Expansion Act of 1995 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to disregard up to $15 million of capital expenditures in applying the provisions permitting a $10 million limit on qualified small issue bonds.
